name: Flipper Critters
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)



Flipper Critters is set in an imaginary world filled with a variety of remarkable places, from town squares and mountain valleys to towering castles and even the moon.

In this magical world, you'll find all the traditional pinball features, including ramps, sinkholes, bumpers, jackpots, gates, and goals—just in a different form than you've ever seen them.

Throughout the game, you will encounter and receive help from Flipper Critters' unusual inhabitants. Many characters will offer help or quests and challenges to undertake.

In order to travel the Flipper Critters' world, you'll need to complete objectives on each level. Sometimes you'll only have to open a door and roll along a ramp, while on other occasions, you'll have to activate a vehicle and use that to travel to a new place.

  • Full 3D environments
  • Classic pinball features in an adventure game
  • Minigames
  • Nonlinear gameplay
  • Two game modes: arcade and story
  • Uses the +Control Pad, Touch Screen and Wireless Communication
